name: The Witches Trial
description:
On Halloween night a group of kids take a test of courage, and dare a young girl to step into the haunted mansion of a witch. The moment she enters the doors threshold the door slams behind her and locks with a click.

Something lurks just beyond your vision. And it's hungry....

Creators: Diego (Audio), Jen (Art), Ryan (Programming)

A game made for the Spooktober Jam of 2019

https://itch.io/jam/scream-jam-2019
